title.list:
1. To boost and clean your whole system: a. Apple b. Ginger c. Carrot
2. For cold: a. Warm liquids--Hot water+honey+lemon b. Milk c. Garlic d. Honey e. Oranges f. Lemons g. Grapefruit h. Cauliflower i. Parsley j. Celery k. Peppermint
3.To clean kidney: a.Watermelon b.Apple c.Pineapple
4.To reduce body heat and texture and moisture: a.Orange b.Cucumber c.Ginger
5.To avoid your bad breath: a.Milk b.Bitter Gourd c.Apple
6.To increase cell activity and immunity: a.Milk b.Grapes c.Honeydew d.Watermelon
7. To reduce head and stomach ache: a.Cucumber b.Celery c.Apple
8.To reduce cough: a.Honey b.Tulsi c.Ginger tea d.Graggle with salt water
9. To improve skin complexion: a. Cucumber b. Kiwi c. Apple
10.To prevent cancer: a. Baking soda b. Lemon c. Turmeric
